text: @narendramodi Ye SAARC wark se kuch nahi ukhdega. Germany, Canada, Australia aur Italy se madad dila sakte hain to kahiye Modiji! International travelers not showing symptoms but carrying COVID-19 are not being checked - they're already spreading virus in hundreds, like it happened in Pune!
